text: Joseph Stanley Okumu (born 26 May 1997) is a Kenyan professional footballer who plays as a defender for IF Elfsborg. ==Club career== Okumu has played club football for Chemelil Sugar, Free State Stars and AFC Ann Arbor. At AFC Ann Arbor he made 8 league appearances in the 2018 season. On 16 August 2018, Okumu signed for USL Championship side Real Monarchs. On 28 August 2019, Okumu transferred to Swedish Allsvenskan side IF Elfsborg for an undisclosed fee. ==International career== After spending time with the Kenyan under-21 and under-23 teams, he made his international debut for the senior team in 2016. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kisumu County Category:Kenyan footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Chemelil Sugar F.C. players Category:Free State Stars F.C. players Category:AFC Ann Arbor players Category:Real Monarchs players Category:IF Elfsborg players Category:Kenyan Premier League players Category:South African Premier Division players Category:National Premier Soccer League players Category:USL Championship players Category:Kenya international footballers Category:2019 Africa Cup of Nations players Category:Kenyan expatriate footballers Category:Kenyan expatriate sportspeople in South Africa Category:Kenyan expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Kenyan expatriate sportspeople in Sweden Category:Expatriate soccer players in South Africa Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Expatriate footballers in Sweden
title: Joseph Okumu
